channel.title: [PI] Custom Item Model Error or What? [PI]
channel.description: I got all the Int's in and all the models set but the items are not appearing right. First of all I need to know how to set what slot to put the Custom Item in as in my Dragon Defender is in the weapon spot how do i move to shield slot? And then my Koraski's Sword and Arcanian Doomblade are appearing like a small green wall right next to the right hand. Please help me!!!

item.title: [PI] Custom Item Model Error or What? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

I got my models to appear on the majority of my items… its mostly just i need to put in the items in the right spots. Could you also tell me how to add bonuses?

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Custom Item Model Error or What? [PI]

item.title: [PI] Custom Item Model Error or What? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @flentman flentman
item.description:
@flentman wrote:

OK I know how to fix the slot, open item.java and find “platebody” theirs a list of items that are plate-bodies well go to the end and add your item ID, compile.

Does the item not appear right? like the arms or shoulders? because if so I got the same problem and its fking annoying

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Custom Item Model Error or What? [PI]
